summary: A documentary that reveals how the unlikely partnership between aspiring filmmakers Christopher Stamp and Kit Lambert produced one of the greatest rock bands in history: The Who.
cast: Christopher Stamp|Kit Lambert|Pete Townshend|Terence Stamp|John Hemming|Richard Barnes|Keith Moon|Heather Daltrey|Constant Lambert|Robert Fearnley-Whittingstall|Roger Daltrey|Irish Jack|John Entwistle|Jimi Hendrix|Arthur Brown|Ritchie Blackmore
title: Lambert & Stamp
